original_text: However, some of them paid no attention to Moses; they kept part of it until morning, but it was full of maggots and began to smell. So Moses was angry with them.
korean_text: 그들이 모세에게 순종하지 아니하고 더러는 아침까지 두었더니 벌레가 생기고 냄새가 난지라 모세가 그들에게 노하니라

sentences.original_text: However, some of them paid no attention to Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들 중 어떤 이들은 모세에게 주의를 기울이지 않았고

sentences.original_text: they kept part of it until morning
but it was full of maggots
So Moses was angry with them
